resources.string: CREATE TABLE urls (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, url TEXT, title TEXT, visits INTEGER, time INTEGER, favorite BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0)
CREATE TABLE history (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, url_id INTEGER, time INTEGER, favorite BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0)
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS urlIndex ON urls (url COLLATE NOCASE)
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS visitsIndex ON urls (visits DESC)
ALTER TABLE history RENAME TO tempHistory
INSERT INTO history (url_id, time) SELECT id, time FROM tempHistory
INSERT INTO urls (id, url, title, visits, time) SELECT id, url, title, 1, time FROM tempHistory
SELECT DISTINCT urls.id, urls.url, urls.title FROM urls, history WHERE urls.id=history.url_id AND (title LIKE ? OR url LIKE ?) ORDER BY history.time DESC LIMIT ?
SELECT history.id, urls.url, urls.title, urls.favorite, history.time FROM urls, history WHERE urls.id=history.url_id ORDER BY history.time DESC LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
SELECT urls.* FROM urls,history WHERE history.id=? AND history.url_id=urls.id
ALTER TABLE urls RENAME to tempUrls

INSERT INTO urls (id, url, title, visits, time, favorite) SELECT t.id, t.url, t.title, count(h.url_id), h.time, t.favorite FROM tempUrls AS t, history AS h WHERE t.id=h.url_id AND (t.favorite>0 OR h.favorite>0) GROUP BY h.url_id

SELECT t.url AS url, t.title AS title, SUM(t.days_count) as count FROM (SELECT urls.url, urls.title, (history.time / 86400000 - STRFTIME(\'%s\', DATE(\'now\', \'-6 months\')) / 86400) AS days_count, urls.id AS id FROM urls, history WHERE urls.id=history.id AND history.time>STRFTIME(\'%s\', DATE(\'now\', \'-6 months\'))*1000) AS t GROUP by t.id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 15
